title: Suspicious Interactions Over Time
description: A heatmap that helps indicate who is engaging in suspicious interactions over the course of the entire dataset.
author: Maria Lentini

title: Suspicious Activity - Daily Number of Interactions
description: A Calendar Heatmap showing the daily number of suspicious interactions. Contains an interactive legend that allows you to click on a color and it will filter out the lower bound number.
author: Brianna Montalvo

title: Interactions Among Suspicious
description: Network graph showing how our group of suspicious people interact over time.  Includes different data sets across different date ranges
author: Paul Stanton
